text: Number Register name Number Register name o krax 8 4r8 1 krex 9 %r9 2 Yrdx A %r10 3 krbx B krii 4 4rsp c 4r12 5 4rbp D 4r13 6 krsi E kri4 7 Jrdi F No register Figure 4.4 Y86-64 program register identifiers. Each of the 15 program registers has an associated identifier (ID) ranging from 0 to OxE. ID OxF in a register field of an instruction indicates the absence of a register operand
